argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsumccatsymgsn.g | |- G = ( SymGrp ` A ) |
| 2 |  | gsumccatsymgsn.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_symggrp | |- ( A e. V -> G e. Grp ) |
| 4 |  | #P_grpmnd | |- ( G e. Grp -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. V -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( +g ` G ) = ( +g ` G ) |
| 7 | 2, 6 | #P_gsumccatsn | |- ( ( G e. Mnd /\ W e. Word B /\ Z e. B ) -> ( G gsum ( W ++ <" Z "> ) ) = ( ( G gsum W ) ( +g ` G ) Z ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( A e. V /\ W e. Word B /\ Z e. B ) -> ( G gsum ( W ++ <" Z "> ) ) = ( ( G gsum W ) ( +g ` G ) Z ) ) |
| 9 | 5 | #P_3ad2ant1 | |- ( ( A e. V /\ W e. Word B /\ Z e. B ) -> G e. Mnd ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( A e. V /\ W e. Word B /\ Z e. B ) -> W e. Word B ) |
| 11 | 2 | #P_gsumwcl | |- ( ( G e. Mnd /\ W e. Word B ) -> ( G gsum W ) e. B ) |
| 12 | 9, 10, 11 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( A e. V /\ W e. Word B /\ Z e. B ) -> ( G gsum W ) e. B ) |
| 13 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( A e. V /\ W e. Word B /\ Z e. B ) -> Z e. B ) |
| 14 | 1, 2, 6 | #P_symgov | |- ( ( ( G gsum W ) e. B /\ Z e. B ) -> ( ( G gsum W ) ( +g ` G ) Z ) = ( ( G gsum W ) o. Z ) ) |
| 15 | 12, 13, 14 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( A e. V /\ W e. Word B /\ Z e. B ) -> ( ( G gsum W ) ( +g ` G ) Z ) = ( ( G gsum W ) o. Z ) ) |
| 16 | 8, 15 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( A e. V /\ W e. Word B /\ Z e. B ) -> ( G gsum ( W ++ <" Z "> ) ) = ( ( G gsum W ) o. Z ) ) |
